item.title: Frozen
item.description: The party finds itself back in the Feywild, much changed. Winter reigns. Nyx remains unresponsive. A frigid night brings visions. Gray recounts the danger of the Wild Hunt. Hoping for options, the group heads towards a fey crossing and reaches out to friends for answers.
